snippet: Confucian academies, or seowon, are drawing more students in a growing campaign to reawaken interest in Confucian teachings.
abstract: South Koreans campaigning to reawaken interest in Confucian teachings are gaining modest ground as growing numbers of students are drawn away from public schools to enroll at Confucian academies, or seowon.
lead_paragraph: Confucian academies, or seowon, are drawing more students in a growing campaign to reawaken interest in Confucian teachings.

headline.main: To Combat Modern Ills, Korea Looks to the Past
headline.print_headline: Feeling Adrift, Koreans Send Children to Camps For Confucian Learning

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
keywords.name: organizations
